name: SFSC Summer Skate Camp
description: Heaven on earth for the young thrasher and eager beginner. The San Francisco Skate Club has offered 17 years of summer skateboarding fun. We are offering 4 sessions that will run 2 weeks where we continue to share the art of skateboarding with youth ages 8 - 14. Please join us for small group instruction (6 youth to 2 adults and 1-2 teen instructors) from 10 am - 3 pm Mon - Fri at various SF parks and explore safe skate locations just a short walk (or push) away from our shop and Headquarters lo

whatTheyOffer: Heaven on earth for the young thrasher and eager beginner. The San Francisco Skate Club has offered 17 years of summer skateboarding fun. We are offering 4 sessions that will run 2 weeks where we continue to share the art of skateboarding with youth ages 8 - 14. Please join us for small group instruction (6 youth to 2 adults and 1-2 teen instructors) from 10 am - 3 pm Mon - Fri at various SF parks and explore safe skate locations just a short walk (or push) away from our shop and Headquarters lo
howToGetIt: Click on link to enroll. https://www.sfskateclub.com/summerskatecamp Required documents must be on file at the San Francisco Skate Club Hub located at: 635A Divisadero St, S.F., CA 94117 at least one week before the start of a selected session.
cost: Each session is $500. (Cost includes daily transportation to and from skate parks, lessons from a SFSC certified instructor, healthy snacks and water, and prizes.)
